dmca.title: [AB-C43880D] [382664] Unauthorized Use of the VeriSign Secured Seal or logo (http://w
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page www.beldecal.com/candle_decals.cfm any of
the material that you claim is being infringed as of 4:24:16 p.m. (GMT-6).

ThePlanet.com
